description:
Doc has received a request to handle a job involving a Nemesis. He rejects it at first, but Seth is determined to go after the Nemesis and accepts the job for him. Thus Seth, Melie, and Doc depart for Rumble Town, the city that roars like thunder. Sorcerers are treated very coldly in this town due to the harsh policies of Captain Konrad of the Inquisition. When Seth encounters the Nemesis, he tries to capture it, but a mysterious sorcerer wrapped in bandages stands in his way...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gouon to Kensou no Machi: Rumble Town
The City That Roars Like Thunder: Rumble Town
